definition: Stefanie Sun (1978-), Singaporean singer-songwriter
grandson/descendant
surname Sun

Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning/north Hebei/the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕 (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕 (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕 (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕 (409-436)/surname Yan
swallow (family Hirundinidae)/old variant of 宴[yan4]
beauty/disposition/looks/appearance

sentences.chinese: 孫燕姿在娛樂百分百的新聞。

sentences.english: Ms Stefanie Sun burst onto the Chinese music scene with her eponymous debut album in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 孫燕姿在2000年憑藉同名專輯進入華語樂壇。

sentences.english: Sun's debut album was a runaway hit.
sentences.chinese: 孫燕姿的首張專輯一炮打響。

sentences.english: Sun Yanzi cut a new album last month.
sentences.chinese: 孫燕姿上月錄製了一張新專輯。

sentences.english: Stef is Singapore's favorite daughter, or Sun, if you will.
sentences.chinese: 孫燕姿是我們新加坡人最寵愛的女兒。

sentences.english: Stef was gorgeous last night at the Gucci event!
sentences.chinese: 昨晚在古奇的活動孫燕姿如此華麗。

sentences.english: If I have 1 millon dollars, first I will see my idol Stefanie .
sentences.chinese: 如果我有一百萬美金，首先我會去見我的偶像孫燕姿。
